data.title: ABS Journal (Australia) vol 2 2000.pdf
data.meta_description: This is the final volume I edited before departing Australia in 2000. the papers are "Creativity and Spirituality - are they related?" by Negin Sanaei"; "The Beautiful Flight toward the Light: Reflections on an Artist’s
data.text: This is the final volume I edited before departing Australia in 2000. the papers are "Creativity and Spirituality - are they related?" by Negin Sanaei"; "The Beautiful Flight toward the Light: Reflections on an Artist’s Life", by Robin M. Chandler: "The Creative Inspiration: Symbolism and Seeing" by Karel Fontaine; "Of Paramount Importance - Addressing the Paucity of Music in Bahá’í Devotional Practice" by Michael Knopf; "The Passionate Artist" by Ron Price; "Building Creative Communities: approaching the arts as social & economic development through professionalizing, training, and networking internationally" by Robin M. Chandler; "Arts Can Move the Youth" by Mahyar Amjadi; "Letters inscribed upon His sacred scroll : An anthology of poetry by Australian Bahá’ís 1999: by Belinda Belton; "Remembrance of Clara & Hyde Dunn" by Hooshang Eshraq-Khavari; "The Bot. Series" by Vahid Payman; "Something Regal: Uncle Fred Murray. A compilation of tributes, photographs and stories" by June Perkins; "A lonely road to native title determination" by Walter Waia; "Mr Faizi and Mr Furútan in Australia: the Yerrinbool tapes"; "Women and Religious Change: a case study in the colonial migrant experience", by Miriam Dixson; " The Practice of Taqiyyih (Dissimulation) in the Bábí and Bahá’í Religions", by Sepehr Manuchehri; "A “Phoenix Schedule” for the Dewey “200s” – Suggested in particular for Bahá’í Libraries" by Paul Gerard; and "Report on scholarship" by Graham Hassall. by putting this file on academia.edu I am not claiming authorship of these papers, just editorship. those were wonderful years.
